commit_scope: Fix stdout redirect in claude-code-host-runner-task.yml: use >/tmp/phase*.json instead of 2>/tmp/phase*.json so --output-format json output is captured.
evidence_refs: Run 22499270717 confirmed: claude --output-format json writes JSON to stdout; 2>/tmp/phase*.json captured stderr (empty), not the JSON
Fix: changed all three phase redirects from 2>/tmp/phase*.json to >/tmp/phase*.json
Phase 1 Opus assessment ran successfully (2m, $0.73, 15 turns) despite file redirect error

phase_gate.blocking_reason: ci_validation pending — need successful strong-cheap-strong run to confirm fix

expected: claude-code-host-runner-task.yml strong-cheap-strong run: all 3 phases complete with modelUsage in summary

deploy_validation.notes: Workflow-only change; no runtime service change
